features.situation: to your effective HT whenever you roll to recover lost HP or to see if you can get over a crippling injury

6fa719dd-cd1f-4536-8f41-b1a9a2045f1c.name: Frequency: Constantly
6fa719dd-cd1f-4536-8f41-b1a9a2045f1c.notes: Lose 1 HP per minute without it

c3905167-8dfe-4e42-8206-2418a85c5773.name: Frequency: Hourly
c3905167-8dfe-4e42-8206-2418a85c5773.notes: Lose 1 HP per 10 minutes after missing a hourly dose

061540ea-7ced-4468-a456-29f606f7c511.name: Frequency: Daily
061540ea-7ced-4468-a456-29f606f7c511.notes: Lose 1 HP per hour after missing a daily dose

5fb031f9-0c3d-4f98-8128-50ef8a6f58d9.name: Frequency: Weekly
5fb031f9-0c3d-4f98-8128-50ef8a6f58d9.notes: Lose 1 HP per six hours after missing a weekly dose

798677b6-ebde-40a3-ba96-798873ba4f8b.name: Frequency: Monthly
798677b6-ebde-40a3-ba96-798873ba4f8b.notes: Lose 1 HP per day after missing a monthly dose

852dd042-2f77-4afe-94c4-1f4830c21472.name: Frequency: Seasonally
852dd042-2f77-4afe-94c4-1f4830c21472.notes: Lose 1 HP per 3 days after missing a seasonal dose

6b0dd0d7-5084-40ed-8d65-cf46d88b3cc6.name: Frequency: Yearly
6b0dd0d7-5084-40ed-8d65-cf46d88b3cc6.notes: Lose 1 HP per 2 weeks after missing a yearly dose

64b4c298-6e90-4d61-9a88-0207ff583a6e.name: Aging
64b4c298-6e90-4d61-9a88-0207ff583a6e.notes: Age 2 years for each HP lost due to this dependency

5a21b785-bae0-4e09-afd9-ca6a7692dce5.name: Loner
5a21b785-bae0-4e09-afd9-ca6a7692dce5.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever anyone lingers nearby, watches over your shoulder, etc. If you fail, you lash out at that person just as if you had Bad Temper.

d2e5b85f-ad70-4659-9737-174bfb5b1c25.name: Selfish
d2e5b85f-ad70-4659-9737-174bfb5b1c25.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you experience a clear social slight or “snub.” On a failure, you lash out at the offending party just as if you had Bad Temper.

features.situation: from others when your Selfishness surfaces

471c0d66-7c22-4c88-ad50-9b6ee6b82408.name: Social Stigma (Second-Class Citizen)
471c0d66-7c22-4c88-ad50-9b6ee6b82408.notes: You belong to a group that receives fewer rights and privileges than “full citizens.”
